dt: {bc}the procedure in which magnetic resonance imaging is used

shortdef: magnetic resonance imaging; also : the procedure in which magnetic resonance imaging is used

dt: {bc}magnetic resonance imaging used to detect physical changes (as of blood flow) in the brain resulting from increased neuronal activity

shortdef: magnetic resonance imaging used to detect physical changes (as of blood flow) in the brain resulting from increased neuronal activity —called also functional MRI
